sentences.sContent: They were made welcome with the usual pantomime of exaggerated smiles and gestures.
sentences.sCn: 他们以那种具有夸张的微笑和动作的一般闹剧受到欢迎。

remMethod.val: panto (神话剧) + mime (哑剧) → 哑剧

words.tran: 哑剧演员；凭动作表演的喜剧演员

trans.tranOther: a method of performing using only actions and not words, or a play performed using this method
